trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides a type converter to convert string objects to and from other representations.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a string using the specified context.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xx x xxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x
